created_time: March 20, 2023, 06:40:29 PMLast edit: April 04, 2023, 05:42:52 PM by S3cco
content: X-World Innovation Forum | April 26-27, 2023 | Riyadh, Saudi ArabiaEvent Website: https://xwuforum.com/Supported by the National Technology Development Program and two state accelerators, a closed event will bring together projects that have achieved unique results in technology and development. The event will open doors for investors and partners in Saudi Arabia.Innovative companies are shaping the future of technology in various fields, including:- Telecommunications and the latest developments in mobile device manufacturing- Next-generation social networks with artificial intelligence- Marketplaces with blockchain technology implementation- Vertical takeoff aircraft

comments.author: S3cco
comments.created_time: March 30, 2023, 11:27:12 AMLast edit: April 04, 2023, 05:43:45 PM by S3cco
comments.body: X-World Innovation Forum to Explore the New Tech World https://bitcoingarden.org/x-world-innovation-forum-to-explore-the-new-tech-world/ The X-World Innovation Forum will be held on April 26-27, 2023 in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The much-anticipated event will bring together the most innovative high-tech projects from various sectors that have achieved unique results in development and technology, investors and experts in the field to explore the new center of the technological world: Saudi Arabia....
